content.raw:
Update the commented example code in `__main__` to reflect current usage, e.g. `snap` no longer exists.

First test might read:

```
cam = AndorCam()
cam.enable_cooldown(10)
cam.setup_acquisition(added_attributes={'exposure_time':25*ms,})
cam.acquire()
images = cam.download_acquisition()
print(f'Exposure time was {cam.exposure_time}')
```

This code is super useful for debugging outside of BLACS/labscript.

Update the commented example code in __main__ to reflect current usage, e.g. snap no longer exists.

First test might read:

cam = AndorCam()
cam.enable_cooldown(10)
cam.setup_acquisition(added_attributes={'exposure_time':25*ms,})
cam.acquire()
images = cam.download_acquisition()
print(f'Exposure time was {cam.exposure_time}')

This code is super useful for debugging outside of BLACS/labscript.
